item.description:
It's TRIVIA! No. It's BINGO! No. It's BOTH!!  Many moons ago, we used to play Trivingo at The Bleacher Bar at Fenway. FUN TIMES and great prizes! Well, Trivingo is back at a new venue -- The North Star.  Located "steps away" from the TD Garden, starting July 10th this little pub is starting Trivingo every Tuesday.  Game starts at 8:00pm and is lots of fun!

Two weeks ago, one of our teams Trivingo'd! all rounds! WHOO HOO!! Let's keep the streak going!

The North Star is conveniently located near North Station (Green and Orange Lines).  Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink. PLEASE MAINTAIN A SEPARATE TAB OR PAY AS YOU GO.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture and will try to get tables reserved for us.
item.name: TRIVINGO! At North Star on Tuesday, August 7th
